title: Can i use skin preview and not get banned?
body: im using the skin preview and wonder if its bannable or not just to be safe i want to ask a riot member directly if you dont know what skin preview is its a client side skin changer

replies.body:
Heya Solo,

This [third party program](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) guide can answer your questions. The rule of thumb is... if in doubt it isn't worth your account! 

Good luck!

- Galacius
guys,just let riot answer this question be fast pls,cause the riot skin is not cheap

Our standpoint on [**custom skins or skin viewers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) is essentially "use at your own risk". Many of those programs come attached with keyloggers or scripts which can affect gameplay, so there's a chance our system might detect that and issue a suspension.
